meanings.definition: Jeffs (noun): A plural form of the name Jeff.
meanings.sent1: The Jeffs went to the park together.
meanings.sent2: I saw two Jeffs at the store.
meanings.sent3: The Jeffs had a picnic in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The Jeffs in the neighborhood were like a friendly team.
meanings.sent5: The Jeffs always wore matching hats.

meanings.definition: Jeffs (verb): Third person singular present of the verb 'jeff'.
meanings.sent1: He jeffs every morning before work.
meanings.sent2: She jeffs while listening to music.
meanings.sent3: The cat jeffs lazily in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The car jeffs down the road smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The wind jeffs through the trees gently.

meanings.definition: Jeffs (adjective): Relating to or characteristic of Jeff.
meanings.sent4: The Jeffs smile brightened the room.
meanings.sent5: The Jeffs house was beautifully decorated.
